title: DAY 7 - TS Intro
description: Introduction to trading systems, defining rules, and backtesting the system.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• What a trading system (TS) must include
• Defining clear entry, stop loss, and take profit rules
• Backtesting methodology and importance
• How a valid system removes emotions
• Rules-based trading for consistency
• System refinement process

quiz.question: A trading system (TS) must include:
quiz.explanation: A complete trading system must define precise entry, stop loss, and take profit rules.

quiz.question: Backtesting a system checks:
quiz.explanation: Backtesting reveals how your system would have performed on historical data.

quiz.question: A valid TS removes:
quiz.explanation: A properly defined system removes emotional decision-making by using consistent rules.

quiz.question: Rules-based trading creates:
quiz.explanation: Consistent rules lead to consistent trading behavior and results.

quiz.question: System refinement improves:
quiz.explanation: Continuous refinement of your system improves your trading edge over time.
